title: Immigration interview appointment notices
dataVerified: Full name, case number, appointment date/time/location, case type
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Appointment status (scheduled/completed/rescheduled). Link to USCIS/NVC system (applicant only, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake appointment notices. Domain binding verifies USCIS/NVC. Interview attendance proof. Case status verification. Prevents appointment fraud. Naturalization/AOS interview documentation.
